scripts.buildanddeploy: react-scripts build&&aws s3 sync build/ s3://YOUR_S3_DEPLOY_BUCKET_NAME&&aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id YOUR_CF_DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths '/*'&&aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id YOUR_WWW_CF_DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths '/*'
scripts.postdeploy: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id YOUR_CF_DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths '/*' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id YOUR_WWW_CF_DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths '/*'
scripts.freshtall: npm cache clean --force && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
